summary.subject: Call for Applications: ERCIM STM WG 2025 Award for the Best Ph.D. Thesis on Security and Trust Management
summary.organization: European Research Consortium in Informatics and Mathematics (ERCIM)
summary.purpose: To recognize the best Ph.D. thesis in Security and Trust Management and promote scientific growth of young researchers.
summary.eligibility: Ph.D. holders who defended their thesis during 2024 from any European University.
application_requirements: Short summary of the Thesis (in English)
Letters of support from at least two researchers (one from ERCIM STM WG Institution)

award_ceremony.event: 21st International Workshop on Security and Trust Management (STM 2025)
